Title: Sleeveless Beaded Illusion Gown

----

Sizes: 14, 12, 4, 8, 10, 6

Colors: ivory

Category: evening

Featured-image: ck15-ivory-sleeveless-beaded-illusion-gown_p.jpg

----

Description: The mother of the bride will look stunning in this floor length, 3/4 sleeved gown. The sheer neckline and sleeves add just enough allure. The bodice has ruching around the waistline to synch in any waist. The beading embellishments are across the bodice, and down the sleeves for an elegant polished look.
